amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, prohibits U.S. participation in poppy cultivation or illicit narcotics growth, production, or trafficking and requires a report concerning the Government of Afghanistan's progress in the eradication of poppy cultivation, the disruption of heroin production, and the reduction of the overall supply and demand for illicit narcotics in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a new title III into the bill making general prohibitions on assistance to Afghanistan.

action.text: Waters amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent. The modification changes the provisions for prohibition on United States involvement in poppy cultivation or illicit narcotics growth, production, or trafficking.
On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 0 (Roll no. 181).
